column2: ENGLISH
It has come to my attention that [From.GetTitledName] is a vessel for the holy bloodline. [From.GetSheHeCap] bears the mark of our lord.
I must inform the Archbishop!
Lord Loptyr's revival draws ever closer.

[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

I have confirmed that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] carries the mark of Lord Loptyr. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a vessel for the holy bloodline.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
Excellent news!
At last... it is time to bring the two vessels of the holy bloodline together. Our lord's revival is within sight at last!
This is destined to be.
The time is not right.

A sinister-looking [From.GetManWoman] appears in front of you with a flash of light. [From.GetHerHisCap] smile is evil, and [From.GetHerHis] voice is hypnotic. "Prepare for your rebirth. Once we erase a few memories, we shall introduce you to your new [Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp]. There's no use fighting it. This is destined to be."
W-what... are you d-d-doing? St-stop it! [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]...
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is overpowered by the spell.
Get... out of my mind!
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! attempts to fight off the spell.

The [FromFrom.GetManWoman] from before has brought you to a private room in [Root.Location.GetName] where a [Root.GetManWomanOpp] is waiting for you. Something about [Root.GetHerHimOpp] seems familar, and you feel an immediate kinship with [Root.GetHerHimOpp]...
The appointed time has come and gone, with no word from that [FromFrom.GetManWoman] you encountered before.
I suppose this is love at first sight!
So much for destiny.
Hold on, this is all wrong!

[From.GetTitledName] has rejected us! [From.GetSheHeCap] was not at all willing to marry the other heir to the holy blood. Even my formidable powers of, ah, 'persuasion' proved useless. Our lord's revival will be delayed...
A temporary setback, nothing more.

A cloaked [From.GetManWoman] approaches you in a quiet moment. [From.GetSheHeCap] tells you that [From.GetSheHe] recently met a most remarkable [Root.GetManWomanOpp], one [From.GetSheHe] says is destined to be your [Root.GetHusbandWifeOpp]. [From.GetSheHeCap] asks your permission to to formally introduce the two of you. There is an urgency to [From.GetHerHis] tone.
If this is destiny, how can I refuse?
I will decide such things for myself, thank you.
[From.GetTitledName], a vessel of Lord Loptyr's holy bloodline, has passed away. This will make it harder to produce an heir to the full power of the holy blood.
This will not stop our lord's revival!
It is done. The vessels of the holy bloodline have been joined. Now we only need to await the birth of a child with the full power of our lord's blood.
Only a few years more.

Last night I had a strange dream. A great dark serpent slithered through a city, somehow going unnoticed by everyone it passed. Then it reared up, rising to its full height, taller than the highest buildings around it. It looked me in the eye, then I woke in a cold sweat...
Is this some sort of sign?
